thread.title: Nasdaq Scheduled Resumption in Medigus Ltd. ADRs
thread.title_full: Nasdaq Scheduled Resumption in Medigus Ltd. ADRs

title: Nasdaq Scheduled Resumption in Medigus Ltd. ADRs
text:
Nasdaq Scheduled Resumption in Medigus Ltd. ADRs July 10, 2015 16:15 ET | Source: The NASDAQ OMX Group, Inc. 
NEW YORK, July 10, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Nasdaq Stock Market ® (Nasdaq: NDAQ ) announced that trading in Medigus Ltd. ADRs (Nasdaq: MDGS ) is scheduled to resume on Monday, July 13, 2015 at 7:15 a.m., Eastern Time. Trading in the company’s stock was halted on June 26, 2015 at 15:03:08 Eastern Time. 
For news and additional information about the company, please contact the company directly or check under the company’s symbol using InfoQuotes SM on the Nasdaq ® Web site. 
For more information about The Nasdaq Stock Market, visit the Nasdaq Web site at http://www.nasdaq.com . NDAQO Nasdaq Media Contact: Josh Machiz +1.212.231.5614 Josh.Machiz@nasdaq.com Related Articles other press releases by The NASDAQ OMX Group, Inc.
